program: Honours Bachelor of Science in Human Kinetics (BScHK)
notes: You can take up to 48 units at the 1000 level.
To find an elective, see the course timetable.
Optional science course: choose 3 units from ANP1107, BIO2110, BIO2133, or CHM2120.
Optional APA (1000/2000) courses: choose from APA1122, APA1302, APA2134, APA2302, or LSR1100.
Optional APA (3000/4000) courses: see list of APA courses.
If you haven’t completed Chemistry 4U or equivalent, enrol in CHM1301.
If you haven’t completed Physics 4U or equivalent, enrol in PHY1331.
To enrol in MAT1330, you must have completed MAT4U or MAT1339. The units for this course are in addition to program requirements.
APA4200 or APA4211 is offered year-round and counts as 3 units per term. Enrol in APA4211 by the clinical enrolment deadline.
For clinical registration in APA4211, contact a Faculty of Health Sciences placement adviser.
Following the course sequence is essential to graduate in four years. Course changes may result in delays.
Students admitted with advanced standing must contact the Academic Office to confirm their personalized course sequence.

Fall: ENG1100 or ENG1112 | Workshop in Essay Writing or Technical Report Writing
Winter: ANP1105 | Human Anatomy and Physiology I
BIO1140 | Introduction to Cell and Molecular Biology

Fall: APA2140 | Introduction to Sport and Exercise Psychology
MAT1330 | Calculus for the Life Sciences I
Winter: APA2114 | Biomechanical Analysis of Human Movement
APA2180 | Research Methods in Human Kinetics
APA2314 | Laboratory Techniques in Exercise Physiology and Biomechanics

Fall: APA3381 | Measurement and Data Analysis in Human Kinetics
APA4200 or APA4211 | Research Project or Internship / Clinical Experience
Winter: APA4200 or APA4211 | Research Project or Internship / Clinical Experience
